quizzes.title: Bible Basics - Level 1
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of Bible fundamentals

questions.question: How many books are in the Bible?
questions.explanation: The Bible contains 66 books: 39 in the Old Testament and 27 in the New Testament.

questions.question: What is the first book of the Bible?
questions.explanation: Genesis is the first book of the Bible and means 'beginning'.

questions.question: Who wrote the Four Gospels?
questions.explanation: The Four Gospels were written by Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John.

questions.question: What is the shortest book of the Bible?
questions.explanation: The book of 3 John is the shortest book in the Bible with only 14 verses.

questions.question: In which city was Jesus born?
questions.explanation: Jesus was born in Bethlehem, fulfilling the Old Testament prophecies.

questions.question: How many apostles did Jesus have?
questions.explanation: Jesus chose twelve apostles to be his closest followers.

questions.question: Which prophet spent three days in the belly of a great fish?
questions.explanation: Jonah was swallowed by a great fish and spent three days and nights in its belly.

questions.question: What is the longest book of the Bible?
questions.explanation: The book of Psalms is the longest book of the Bible with 150 chapters.

questions.question: How many plagues did God send upon Egypt?
questions.explanation: God sent ten plagues upon Egypt to convince Pharaoh to let the Israelites go.

questions.question: Who built the Ark in the Old Testament?
questions.explanation: Noah built the Ark following God's instructions to save his family and animals from the flood.

quizzes.title: Bible Advanced - Level 3
quizzes.description: Advanced Bible study for deep learners

questions.question: What was the original language of the Old Testament?
questions.explanation: The Old Testament was originally written in Hebrew, with some portions in Aramaic.

questions.question: Which book contains the most verses?
questions.explanation: The book of Psalms contains 2,461 verses, making it the book with the most verses.

questions.question: How many times is the word 'love' mentioned in 1 Corinthians 13?
questions.explanation: The word 'love' (or variations) appears 9 times in 1 Corinthians 13, the famous love chapter.

questions.question: What is the name of the Jewish festival where Jesus performed the feeding of the 5000?
questions.explanation: Jesus performed the Passover miracle during the Jewish Passover festival.

questions.question: Which apostle wrote the most books of the New Testament?
questions.explanation: Paul wrote thirteen books of the New Testament, more than any other apostle.
